definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: RRM will develop more storefronts for serving the public.
sentences.chinese: 爲了更好的服務大衆，日日美企業準備開更多的門店。

sentences.english: The days and nights were a blur of medical reports.
sentences.chinese: 日日夜夜都是治療報告。

sentences.english: There are minds facing states, so how Bo grows up one day ?
sentences.chinese: 臥輪有伎倆，能斷百思想對境心不起，菩提日日長。

sentences.english: With each passing day, you will possess the merits of the six paramitas.
sentences.chinese: 是人日日得具六波羅蜜圓滿功德。

sentences.english: Amid flowers I drink all day.
The Yellow River rolls on day and night.
sentences.chinese: 黃河日日夜夜地奔騰不息。

sentences.english: Stick to post it day and night, constantly turning.
sentences.chinese: 它日日夜夜地堅守崗位，一刻不停地轉動着。

sentences.english: Each new day brings another plot to assassinate me and bring us closer to anarchy and terror.
sentences.chinese: 日日有人謀劃暗殺我，將國家逼向動亂和恐怖。

sentences.english: And he changed his prison garments, and he ate bread before him always all the days of his life.
sentences.chinese: 脫去他的囚衣，以後一生日日與王共進飲食。

sentences.english: China's prosperity day hope, concerted efforts must be achieved.
sentences.chinese: 中國強盛日日盼，衆志成城必實現。

sentences.english: I worked day and night in that company and worked in 8 projects in 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 我日日夜夜的工作，在7年內參與了8個項目。

sentences.english: Young volunteers are also found in media apartments day and night.
sentences.chinese: 日日夜夜，我們都能在美圖村發現青年志願者。

sentences.english: Youth is an important stage of life, it plays a decisive role for personal growth.
sentences.chinese: 人生難得是青春，要學湯銘日日新。

sentences.english: How do we deal with the day-in/day-out misery that plagues us?
sentences.chinese: 我們如何才能解決那些日日夜夜折磨着我們的痛苦呢？

sentences.english: Day and night, frontier guards defend our motherland's border areas.
sentences.chinese: 邊防戰士們日日夜夜守衛着祖國的邊疆。

sentences.english: Northeast of Brazil grassland, a rodeo drama staged every day.
sentences.chinese: 巴西東北的草原邊，日日上演暴烈的牛仔競技戲碼。

definition: from dawn to dusk/all the time
day after day/for several days running
